LanguageData.BlocksVacstone.label: bloic folúschloiche
LanguageData.ChunkVacstone.label: leadhb folúschloiche
LanguageData.ChunkVacstone.description: Leadhb cloiche. Is féidir bloic cloiche a dhéanamh as.
LanguageData.SmoothedSolidIce.label: oighir mín
LanguageData.SmoothedSolidIce.description: Leac oighir soladach. Is féidir é a ghearradh go héasca. Tá dath gorm ar an dromchlá mín.
LanguageData.SmoothedVacstone.label: folúschloch mhín
LanguageData.SmoothedVacstone.description: Folúschloch mhín, déanta as clocha agus dusta brúite a baineadh ó astaróidigh.
LanguageData.SolidIce.label: oighear soladach
LanguageData.SolidIce.description: Leac oighir soladach. Is féidir é a ghearradh go héasca.
LanguageData.Vacstone.label: folúschloch
LanguageData.Vacstone.description: Clocha agus dusta brúite, a baineadh ó astaróidigh.
